ComicInfo.Summary:
Mechanics / Las Mujeres Perdidas, part two: Maggie and Race, hired by Dr. Beaky, arrive in Rio Frio for a job repairing robots on the island of Chepan.
Act of Contrition Part 3: Luba is in San Fideo in an attempt to get a part to repair her movie house's projector. Meanwhile, unbeknowst to her, her bath house is part rubble because the water heater blew up. By chance she meets up with Archie again and their cooled relationship heats up and turns physical.
Locos: Speedy recounts to Carlos Izzy's evolution from gang leader to straight-laced college student to dark neighborhood eccentric.
The Whispering Tree: Guadalupe tells Doralis a ghost story about a deceased bruja and a tree.
